title: Risen Fiddlesticks bursts from his tomb

replies.body: haha! just noticed that fiddles arms are always crossed over his stomach its just his suite that's holding the scythe {{summoner:2}} {{champion:9}}
Skin would be great, if I could play Fid successfully :-)
no matter what i try it always results in mashing and screaming 'RUN YOU MOTHERFUCKERS!!!!'
Finally, a good Fiddlesticks skin. All his other ones are pretty bad, with Bandito being the one exception.

I disagree. Fiddlesticks have 2 very good skins. Surprise Party Fiddlesticks, and Dark Candy Fiddlesticks. However, Surprise Party Fiddlesticks is extremely old, and Dark Candy Fiddlesticks is unavailable. So it's really nice to see a new permanent skin for Fiddlesticks.

although fiddles skins are old they suited back then. id say updte his new splash and original skin still but i like this new fiddle. cant wait to get it. GO SHURIMA. and how would this fit in with their lore?
if anyones ever played dawn of war dark crusade this skin in some shots looks like the necron lord of kronus

I logged in just so I could agree with you. He does look like the Necron lord, except for the whole mummy bandages thing {{champion:9}}  has going on.
Who doesn't love a good old essence of the Nightbringer?
Also its good to see another Warhammer 40k fan playing League.
omg someone got my reference hahah sorry bout th late reply

Fear looks good on this suite' skin package.

But the general look of Risen FiddleSticks is a bit scruffy' and edgy'
I believe the leaver-buster system is so bad now i have to wait 20 minutes to play a game unfair
The leaver-system is fine, don't leave a game and you won't have to wait, it is designed so that people don't have to play with you again, the only way it is annoying is if your PC screws up
{{champion:412}} {{item:3087}}  i've been trying to report this please nurf thresh
looks like a Greater Mummy from Diablo 2. I'd buy it if I played Fiddles
If i actually played fiddlesticks I'd buy this skin, it looks pretty good in my opinion.
